meanings.sent1: The computerless classroom relied on books for research.
meanings.sent2: She felt lost and computerless without her laptop.
meanings.sent3: The computerless office had to resort to handwritten notes.
meanings.sent4: In a world of technology, he was a computerless wanderer.
meanings.sent5: The computerless life seemed simpler and more peaceful.

meanings.sent1: She had to work computerless while her laptop was being repaired.

meanings.sent4: The traveler explored the remote island computerless, embracing the digital detox.
meanings.sent5: The artist created beautiful sketches computerless, away from screens and distractions.
